metadata.title: CVE-2019-7733 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Live555 0.95, there is a buffer overflow via a large integer in aContent-Length HTTP header because handleRequestBytes has an unrestrictedmemmove.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
